T02TD3100E:191a-0: @191a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD3100E:191a-1: nad dang gdon la sogs pa dang por sa gzhi yang gdub cing gas pa dang /
T02TD3100E:191a-2: rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa bya ste /
T02TD3100E:191a-3: dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mchan ba /
T02TD3100E:191a-4: kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba /
T02TD3100E:191a-5: sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te /
T02TD3100E:191a-6: me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro //
T02TD3100E:191a-7: de nas drag po'i mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
T02TD3100E:191a-8: drag po'i rdzas khrag dang dug dang lingga dang /
T02TD3100E:191a-14: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la thab dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te /
T02TD3100E:191a-15: dzam las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du /
T02TD3100E:191a-16: cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD3100E:191a-17: de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD3100E:191a-18: sreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar m'a ra ya btags te /
T02TD3100E:191a-19: khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3100E:191a-20: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o //
T02TD3100E:191a-21: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang /
T02TD3100E:191b-0: dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas @191b rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD3100E:191b-1: de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o //
T02TD3100E:191b-2: mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
